mutants.code:
def multiply(a, b):
    sign = -1 if (a < 0) ^ (b < 0) else 1
    a = abs(a)
    b = abs(b)
    result = 1
    while b:
        if b & 1:
            result += a
        a <<= 1
        b >>= 1
    return sign * result
